ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( ISBLANK(Primary_Contact__r.FirstName) || ISBLANK(Primary_Contact__r.LastName) || ISBLANK(Primary_Contact__r.MailingCity) || ISBLANK(Primary_Contact__r.MailingPostalCode) || ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__r.Email ) || ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__r.MailingStreet ) || ( ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__r.MobilePhone ) && ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__r.HomePhone ) ) ), Primary_Contact__c != NULL)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please review primary contact. Full name, full address, email and phone (Phone or Home Phone) are required.
